name: I Am Not Alone (axeakanksha)
description: A World War II veteran soldier name 'Martin Schultz'  is going home after the dust of World War II was settled.  The time was of Spring Break at the time and during  this vacation period including Easter Holidays  ,Martin was going home to meet his brother Leslie  whom now being a scientist always keeps working  on his research and projects all the time.  Martin was so excited to meet his brother Leslie  so that he could tell him about all his experience  in World War II and to make him be proud of  his brother for fighting alongside his country to  make a greater good.
